block.p: American League DETROIT TIGERS--Sent 1B-OF Dusty Allen, OF Rod Lindsey and LHP Kevin Tolar outright to Toledo of the International League.
American League DETROIT TIGERS--Sent 1B-OF Dusty Allen, OF Rod Lindsey and LHP Kevin Tolar outright to Toledo of the International League.
National League FLORIDA MARLINS--Announced RHP Brian Edmondson has elected to exercise his right of free agency.
National Basketball Association LOS ANGELES CLIPPERS--Waived F Rocky Walls and C Joe Vogel. NEW JERSEY NETS--Waived G Adrian Autry.
National Football League INDIANAPOIS COLTS--Re-signed RB Paul Shields. Released OL Tim Ridder.
National Hockey League ATLANTA THRASHERS--Re-assigned F Brad Tapper to Orlando of the IHL. CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Signed LW Kris King.
National Lacrosse League NLL--Promoted Christopher Bandura to director of media relations and internet development.
Major League Soccer NEW YORK-NEW JERSEY METROSTARS--Named Chris Brienza vice president of media relations.

BLOOMFIELD--Named Matthew Donohue women's basketball coach. BUFFALO STATE--Named Fred Batchelor women's basketball coach, Bob Filighera women's ice hockey coach and assistant ice arena manager and Courtney Longua women's soccer and lacrosse coach. CALIFORNIA--Named Camille Burkes women's assistant basketball coach.
